vendor_name: Kupu Kupu Jimbaran Beach Club and Spa
title: Blissful Balinese Escape with Luxurious Spa Treatment
description: Relax and recharge with a stay at Kupu Kupu Jimbaran Beach Club and Spa. This stylish resort offers a beautiful location where you can immerse yourself in the tranquillity of Jimbaran, while still having easy access to all Bali has to offer. The jewel in the resort’s crown is the stunning Bamboo Spa by L’OCCITANE, where you can feel your troubles melt away with blissful massage treatments and more. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a 90-minute Balinese massage, two three-course set menu lunches at Chocolate Café, access to the popular Jimbaran Beach Club with priority seating, one-way airport transfers and more.
location_description: Kupu Kupu Jimbaran Beach Club and Spa
offer_address: Jimbaran, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Relaxing Bali Escape
description: Enjoy a laidback break in Bali at The Sintesa Jimbaran, located in a tranquil spot just a short shuttle ride from the beach, shops and restaurants. With daily breakfast, a daily cocktail per adult, one three-course dinner for two, a relaxing Balinese massage, a one-way airport transfer and a daily shuttle service to nearby Jimbaran Beach all included in your package, there’s something to keep everyone happy.
offer_address: Jl. Kencana No.1, Jimbaran, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: The Jimbaran Villa by Ini Vie Hospitality
title: Secluded Jimbaran Private Pool Villas with Rooftop Terrace, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Beer
description:
Answer the call of Bali’s pristine beaches, palm-fringed landscapes and turquoise waters with a stay at The Jimbaran Villa. Perfect for a romantic getaway, this hidden oasis offers boutique accommodation in a quieter region of Bali, all within easy walking distance of beachfront restaurants and bars.

Relax with ease in spacious villas and catch the picturesque sunset from your furnished rooftop terrace, or sink even further into wellness enrichment with a laze in the comfortable hammock hanging next to your private pool.
offer_address: Jalan Bukit Permai, Mimpi Resort No. 88, Jimbaran 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Jimbaran Private Pool Villa Stay with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Daily Beer
description:
Relax from your upgraded private pool villa nestled between the beach and the hills of Jimbaran, home to golden beaches, sunsets and a laid-back atmosphere. Enjoy traditional and international favourites at Sattvic Restaurant, or sit back with a cocktail and some light tapas while taking in the tropical views from Cilantro Rooftop Bar & Lounge.

For complete relaxation, choose from a menu of treatments available at Thyme Spa, or take advantage of regular cooking and sunset yoga classes hosted by the resort. Shuttles to local beaches run regularly, allowing you to explore the surrounding area whenever you're not taking in all that the resort has to offer.
offer_address: Jalan Jepun, Karang Mas Sejahtera No 81, Jimbaran, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Unmissable Five-Star RIMBA by AYANA Bali Escape with Daily Dining Across 11 Restaurants & Rock Bar Priority Access
description:
Experience a not-to-be-missed stay at an award-winning, world-class haven that stretches across 90 hectares of clifftop land above Jimbaran Bay. Book an exquisite escape to Bali’s only resort integrated with AYANA Bali and bear witness to majestic sunsets and lush verdant gardens that are complemented by five-star shared facilities. Dotted along the coast-hugging grounds are 14 dreamy swimming pools - including three with waterslides and another with a swim-up bar. Gourmands will revel in the chance to explore an array of restaurants and bars across the shared resort complex, serving everything from traditional Balinese to Mediterranean fare, cocktails and tapas.

For those who enjoy an active escape, take advantage of the complimentary resort shuttle and visit the recreation facilities at both RIMBA and the AYANA Estate, which include a golf-putting course and fitness centres. A world-class spa is close at hand for pampering and relaxation, and the world-famous Rock Bar provides the perfect setting to watch the sunset with a cocktail in hand. Or, simply step straight out onto the white-sand Kubu Beach and soak up the Balinese bliss or cool off in the azure waters.
offer_address: Jalan Karang Mas Sejahtera, Jimbaran, Bali 80364, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Beachfront Luxury with Daily Dining Inclusions
description: Discover the beauty of Jimbaran, Bali staying at the five-star beachfront paradise of Belmond Jimbaran Puri, one of the renowned Belmond group's ultra-luxurious hotels. Truly unwind with a daily buffet breakfast, choice of daily three-course lunch or dinner, two 30-minute massages each, convenient airport pick-up, guaranteed late 1pm checkout and a complimentary cocktail each.
offer_address: Jalan Uluwatu Yoga Perkanthi Lane, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: InterContinental Jimbaran Beachfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Enjoy the luxurious seclusion of traditional Balinese living at this five-star resort from the notable InterContinental brand, the first of its kind to be built on the shores of the serene Jimbaran Bay. A mirage of lush tropical foliage opposite the secluded, powder-white beachfront, this village-style retreat invites you to unwind away from the crowds.

Start your days with a delicious breakfast at Taman Gita overlooking the gardens, feel the sand between your toes at Sunset Beach Bar & Grill, swing by Jimbaran Gardens to soak up the seaside ambience, and indulge in the jetted tub, steam room and sauna at the Spa Uluwatu. Bring the whole family along, with one child staying and eating free, and treat the little ones to a variety of exciting resort activities from tennis to paddleboarding and access to the Planet Trekkers Kids’ Club.

Relax as you please in the resort’s collection of newly refreshed rooms and suites complete with handmade furnishings, classic Balinese touches, breezy private balconies and marble bathtubs. Venture out to explore the glorious semi-secluded stretch of beach, float in the sparkling resort pool, or stretch out waterside with a refreshing cocktail at the Pool Bar.

Enhance the opulence with an upgraded stay in a Club room or Suite for access to the Club InterContinental lounge to enjoy daily breakfast, light refreshments, afternoon tea and two-hour nightly free-flow drinks in the luxurious lounge space. Experience the best of Bali from this next-level beachfront location, within 15 minutes of the airport and easy reach of the Kuta shopping district and the Nusa Dua resort enclave.
offer_address: 45 Jalan Raya Uluwatu, Jimbaran, Kuta Selatan, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Grand Opening: Private Pool Villa
description: Discover secluded romance at the brand-new X2 Bali Breakers Resort in Jimbaran, staying in a lavish private pool villa. This hideaway is set within lush tropical gardens and sits just 10 minutes’ drive from some of Bali’s best beaches, offering the ultimate escape for couples. Enjoy daily breakfast, your choice of daily lunches or dinners, nightly cocktail each, relaxing 60-minute massage each, private one-way transfer from Denpasar Airport and a guaranteed late 1pm checkout.
offer_address: Jl. Pantai Balangan no. 10, Balangan, Jimbaran, Bali, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Escape with Daily Breakfast and Gourmet Inclusions
description: Kick back, relax and enjoy the serenity of Jimbaran - the ultra-chilled side of Bali - staying at the newest resort in the area: The Royal Tulip Springhill Resort Jimbaran. Your escape includes daily breakfast, two multi-course dinners during your stay, a 60-minute Balinese massage per person, a daily cocktail each, two afternoon tea experiences and a one-way airport transfer. Plus, enjoy complimentary scheduled shuttle transport to Jimbaran Beach Club during your stay and a leisurely late 1pm checkout.
offer_address: Jalan Jimbaran Hijau Kelod Jimbaran Bali 80361

title: Family-Friendly Bali Mövenpick Indulgence with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Chocolate Hour
description:
Life doesn’t get much sweeter than a stay at the award-winning, five-star Mövenpick Resort & Spa Jimbaran Bali, offering true resort luxury and nonstop family fun just minutes from the shimmering beachfront of Jimbaran. This gourmet sanctuary - brought to you by the brand behind the Swiss-style artisan ice cream - is home to stunning swimming pools, high-end restaurants and, of course, plenty of Mövenpick's signature sweet creations. While young ones have the time of their lives at the pirate ship-themed kids' club, adults can indulge in afternoon cocktails with sweeping views or a rejuvenating Indonesian treatment at the tranquil onsite spa. The impressive multi-level, water-slide-adorned swimming pool and the dazzling array of activities available to book through Mövenpick - from watersport adventures to cultural tours - will provide endless excitement for the whole family.

Then there's the Samasta Lifestyle Village next door - an open-air shopping, dining and entertainment complex just a few steps from the hotel lobby. You'll also be just a short stroll from the relaxed, cafe-lined sands of Pantai Muaya, famous for its scenic sunsets and relaxed Jimbaran vibes.
offer_address: Jalan Wanagiri No.1, Jimbaran, South Kuta, Bali 80362, Indonesia

title: Bali Pool Villa Luxe near Jimbaran Beach with Daily Dining, Sunset Cocktails, Two 90-Minute Massages & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Set moments from the pristine sands of Jimbaran Beach, you’ll find the five-star Kayumanis Jimbaran Private Estate & Spa - an exclusive tropical haven of expansive villas with private pools, fringed with tropical greenery. Fusing traditional Balinese elements with opulent dark wood accents and thatched roofs while blissfully integrating modern luxuries, each villa has spacious day beds to catch up on some well-deserved relaxation, an expansive courtyard, and wide glass doors that allow the balmy sea breeze in.

With traditional and international delicacies on offer at Kayumanis Resto Jimbaran, and a menu of relaxing treatments available at the spa, it's easy to spend your entire stay at the resort. But venture beyond the walls of your private villa and you'll find idyllic Jimbaran Beach, famed for its white sands, sapphire waters, casual seafood cafés lining the shore, and hypnotic evening sunsets. For adventures a little further afield, the thundering waves of Uluwatu or the idyllic enclave of Nusa Dua can be reached within a 20-minute drive.

Nestled amid 90 hectares of tropical forest above Jimbaran Bay, AYANA Segara Bali is the newest luxurious addition to the award-winning AYANA Bali complex. Indulge at the state-of-the-art rooftop terrace, featuring sensational infinity pools, plush daybeds and Luna Rooftop Bar, where you can sip a cocktail as the sun sets and transforms the sky into a striking array of colours over the ocean.

Guests of AYANA Segara Bali are also invited to make use of the renowned wellness and dining facilities of the wider AYANA complex, including one of Bali's most legendary venues for a cocktail with a view - Rock Bar, carved into the rockface by the crashing ocean - in addition to 14 pools, a miniature 18-hole golf course, Kubu Beach, and a spa and fitness centre. At the end of the day, relax in style with deep-soaking bathtubs and private balconies in every room.

Each of the 20 expansive villas perfectly fuses traditional Balinese elements with opulent dark-wooden accents and thatched roofs while blissfully integrating modern luxuries sure to win you over. Each has its own private plunge pool, spacious day beds to catch up on some well-deserved relaxation, an expansive courtyard fringed with lush tropical greenery, and wide glass doors that allow the balmy sea breeze in. title: Bali Ultimate Oceanfront Luxury: Cliffside Oasis with Massages, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Experience the grandeur of five-star AYANA Resort Bali, situated on the cliff-tops of Jimbaran's renowned 'sunset coast'. Recently renovated, the resort now boasts enhanced facilities and accommodations, surrounded by lush tropical gardens and sweeping Indian Ocean views.

AYANA Resort Bali is a destination in its own right, boasting 30 world-class restaurants, bars and cafes, 14 shimmering pools, including a kids' one equipped with slides, and 13 boutique shops. The standout? Rock Bar - carved into the cliffside, known for its sunset views, expertly crafted cocktails and DJ sets that draw a global crowd.

There's a slice of paradise for every age and the Kids’ Playground is just the start - at AYANA, little explorers can learn about sustainability at the farm, roll dough in pizza-making classes and connect with Balinese culture. Meanwhile, adults can retreat to AYANA Spa for wellness rituals or oceanfront treatments at Spa on the Rocks.

When it’s time to explore, Jimbaran Village is a short drive away - think art galleries, markets, fine dining, ancient temples and outdoor adventures just beyond the resort.

Lunge into first-class recreation facilities at both AYANA Resort Bali and sister resort RIMBA by AYANA Bali, which include a golf-putting course, fitness centre and world-class spa. If you can tear yourself away from the grounds, be sure to make use of the complimentary resort shuttle to visit nearby attractions, or simply step straight out onto the picture-perfect private beach to soak up the unrivalled tranquillity.
offer_address: Jalan Karang Mas Sejahtera Jimbaran, Bali 80364, Indonesia

title: Mövenpick Bali Indulgence Is Back with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner, Chocolate Hour & Children Eat Free
description:
Life doesn’t get much sweeter than a stay at this five-star family resort, offering true resort luxury and non-stop family fun just minutes from the shimmering beachfront of Jimbaran. Mövenpick Resort & Spa Jimbaran Bali is home to stunning swimming pools and high-end eateries like Anarasa restaurant and Mövenpick Cafe. 

While young ones have the time of their lives at the pirate ship-themed kids' club, adults can indulge in afternoon cocktails with sweeping views or a rejuvenating treatment at the spa.

The impressive multi-level, water-slide-adorned swimming pool and the dazzling array of activities available to book through Mövenpick - from watersport adventures to cultural tours - will provide endless excitement for the whole family. 

Then there's the Samasta Lifestyle Village next door - an open-air shopping, dining and entertainment complex just a few steps from the hotel lobby. You'll also be just a short stroll to the relaxed, cafe-lined sands of Pantai Muaya, famous for its scenic sunsets and relaxed Jimbaran vibes.
offer_address: Jalan Wanagiri No.1, Jimbaran, South Kuta, Bali 80362, Indonesia

title: Bali Tropical Jimbaran Private Pool Villas with All-Day Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Kids Stay Free
description:
Mere moments from Jimbaran Beach's white sands and shaded by swaying coconut palms, this lavish Balinese village-style resort awaits. Couples and families alike can seek solace in this oasis, once a coconut grove, now a tropical haven that still feels worlds away from reality.

With dark wood accents and thatched roofs, all 20 pool villas seamlessly blend traditional Balinese charm with modern comforts, such as expansive private pools. A dedicated butler ensures every desire is attended to, while Kayumanis Spa Jimbaran is the ultimate sanctuary offering rituals inspired by Indonesia's healing traditions. No craving will go uncured with Kayumanis Resto’s exquisite traditional and international delicacies, served in abundance.

Although you won’t want to leave your villa, just beyond its walls lies idyllic Jimbaran Beach, famed for its white sands, sapphire waters, casual seafood cafes and hypnotic sunsets. For adventures further afield, both Uluwatu’s world-class surf and the luxurious enclave of Nusa Dua are a 20-minute drive away.
offer_address: Jalan Yoga Perkanthi, Jimbaran, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Ultimate Indulgence: Family Escape with Nightly Dinner, Chocolate Hour & Kids Eat Free
description:
Life doesn’t get much sweeter than a stay at this five-star family resort, offering true luxury and non-stop family fun just minutes from the shimmering beachfront of Jimbaran. This lavish resort is home to stunning swimming pools and high-end eateries like Anarasa Restaurant, Mövenpick Cafe and the brand-new Mexican-inspired Adriana Cocina & Bar.

While young ones have the time of their lives at the pirate ship-themed kids' club, adults can indulge in afternoon cocktails with sweeping views or a rejuvenating treatment at the spa.

The impressive multi-level, water-slide-adorned swimming pool and the dazzling array of activities available to book through Mövenpick - from water sport adventures to cultural tours - will provide endless excitement for the whole family.

Then there's the Samasta Lifestyle Village next door - an open-air shopping, dining and entertainment complex just a few steps from the hotel lobby. You'll also be just a short stroll to the relaxed, cafe-lined sands of Pantai Muaya, famous for its scenic sunsets and relaxed Jimbaran vibes.
offer_address: Jalan Wanagiri No.1, Jimbaran, South Kuta, Bali 80362, Indonesia

vendor_name: Gending Kedis Luxury Villas & Spa Jimbaran
title: Jimbaran Private Pool Villas, Bali
description: Witness some of Bali’s best sunsets, dine at beachfront seafood restaurants and sip cocktails at cliffside bars in Jimbaran with five nights in a huge 216sqm private pool villa at Gending Kedis. This is a holiday for foodies with daily breakfasts, a cooking class, an alfresco dinner, an afternoon tea and cocktails included, as well as Balinese massages and a salon pampering experience.
offer_address: Jl. Karang Mas Sejahtera No.100Y, Jimbaran, Kuta Selatan, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia​

title: Five-Star Bali Rainforest Retreat near Jimbaran Bay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Pamper the whole family with an exquisite vacation to Royal Tulip Springhill Resort Jimbaran, a luxurious hotel resort surrounded by lush rainforest. Ideally situated in between the bustling town and the beach, the resort offers the perfect opportunity to unwind, with an array of restaurants and vibrant bars just a stone’s throw away. The glamorous resort is also just 15 minutes from Jimbaran Bay, a long stretch of beach famous for its sunset views and the relaxed restaurants along the beachfront.

Despite the gorgeous setting, you may be tempted to spend all your time in the peaceful grounds of the resort: sip on a cocktail by the gorgeous outdoor pool before rejuvenating with traditional Balinese massages. Enjoy a sumptuous Asian or Mediterranean-inspired dinner at Basil & Thyme Restaurant, which doubles as a cocktail bar, open from breakfast to supper. Enjoy some me-time as children participate in the activities and games on offer at the Kids' Club, or keep up your health routine in the fitness centre.
offer_address: Jalan Jimbaran, Hijau Kelod, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Private Pool Villa Luxury at The Leaf Jimbaran, Bali
description: Relax and rejuvenate with a five-night stay in a One Bedroom Pool Villa at The Leaf Jimbaran in Bali. Includes return airport transfers, daily à la carte breakfasts, healthy dining experiences, a 60-minute massage each, cocktails and more.
offer_address: Karang Mas Sejahtera No. 81, Jl. Jepun, Jimbaran, Badung, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Ultra-Luxe Clifftop Pool Villas Perched above Jimbaran Bay with 30 Restaurants and Bars & 14 Pools
description:
AYANA Villas Bali offers the ultimate in exclusivity and privacy within the lush grounds of AYANA Bali. Spacious one-, two- and three bedroom villas serve as a serene sanctuary for guests seeking seclusion and luxury. Each villa boasts a private pool, expansive living areas, and 24-hour dedicated butler service.

While designed to provide a secluded retreat, the villas also grant access to AYANA Bali’s extensive amenities, including fine dining, world-class spa services, and various recreational activities, promising a truly unparalleled escape.
offer_address: Karang Mas Estate, Jalan Karang Mas Sejahtera Jimbaran, Bali 80364, Indonesia

title: Clifftop Bali Oasis Overlooking Jimbaran Bay with 14 Swimming Pools
description:
AYANA Segara Bali, the latest addition to AYANA Bali provides an intimate, boutique experience within a peaceful and personal escape. Its minimalist, modern and chic design offers an exceptional retreat with rooms and suites featuring private balconies that provide stunning views of the sparkling ocean or lush, tropical gardens.

Thoughtfully designed spaces create a serene atmosphere, ideal for unwinding and rejuvenating in complete comfort. Sip on sunset cocktails at Luna Rooftop Bar and indulge in a Mediterranean feast at Scusa. With access to the secluded beach, enjoy the best of both worlds; a quiet retreat with the option of indulging in the larger resort's vibrant offerings.
offer_address: Jalan Karang Mas Sejahtera, Jimbaran, Bali, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Jimbaran Bay Beachfront Escape at the InterContinental Bali Resort
description: Immerse yourself in the ambience of a traditional Balinese village at the five-star InterContinental Bali Resort, the first hotel of its kind to be built on the shores of the serene Jimbaran Bay. A mirage of lush tropical foliage opposite the secluded, powder-white shoreline, this village-style retreat invites you to bathe under the glistening sun away from the crowds. Start your days with a delicious buffet at Taman Gita Terrace, feel the sand between your toes at Sunset Beach Bar & Grill, swing by Jimbaran Gardens to soak up the seaside ambiance and indulge in the jetted tub, steam room and sauna at the Spa Uluwatu (all complimentary without a booked treatment). Experience the best of Bali from this next-level beachfront location, within 15 minutes of the airport and easy reach of the Kuta shopping district and the Nusa Dua resort enclave.
offer_address: Jalan Uluwatu 45, Jimbaran, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Jimbaran Raffles Private Pool Villas with Three Restaurants & World-Class Spa
description:
It doesn't get much more opulent than a Raffles retreat, and this sprawling Jimbaran paradise is no exception. Savour multi award-winning service and five-star luxuries surrounded by secluded tropical gardens and rolling hills, all just steps from a pristine stretch of beach.

Dine at the organic Rumari restaurant or enjoy a casual pizza by the ocean at Loloan Beach Bar & Grill, sip craft cocktails at the signature Writers Bar and walk into a world of calm at the onsite spa. Further afar, explore the nearby Uluwatu Temple, a Balinese sea temple with breathtaking cliffside views.
offer_address: Jalan Karang Mas Sejahtera 1A, Jimbaran, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Beachfront Jumeirah Bali Water Palace-Inspired Luxury with Only Pool Villas
description: Secluded luxury and endless ocean panoramas await at the all-pool villa, five-star Jumeirah Bali, a romantic retreat surrounded by a dramatic coastline, native jungle and lush rice paddies. Perfectly poised on a clifftop on Bali's south coast, overlooking the Indian Ocean, this intimate Hindu water palace-inspired retreat will make you feel like royalty. Let your expectations be met and then surpassed as you luxuriate in the Indian Ocean infinity pool, dine on tantalising open-grill dining at the water-view Akasa restaurant and make the most of an Uluwatu location that's the envy of many.
offer_address: Kawasan Pecatu Indah Resort, Jl. Raya Uluwatu, Pecatu, Kuta Selatan, Kab. Badung, Bali, 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Five-Star Jimbaran Private Pool Villas
description:
Experience the pinnacle of secluded romance at Cross Bali Breakers Resort in Jimbaran, a five-star sanctuary ideally located on Bali’s pristine southern peninsula. Nestled amid lush forest, this luxury hotel is surrounded by rich Balinese jungle but just 10 minutes from the waves of Kuta's famed Balangan Beach and the cool, calm waters of Dreamland Beach. When you're not relaxing beachside, enjoy the privacy of your very own villa, complete with private pool.

Make the most of the resort’s luxurious amenities, which include a sunken swim-up bar, rooftop pool, adults-only serenity pool, state-of-the-art fitness centre and full-service spa. Enjoy an all-day culinary experience at Point Break restaurant, grab a cup of Jimbaran's finest coffee at The Tube Bar, or swim up and enjoy quality snacks and drinks at the Sunken Pool Bar. In the evening, sample creative cocktails overlooking the resort at the unbeatable Hang Loose Bar.
offer_address: Jl. Pantai Balangan no. 10, Balangan, Jimbaran, Bali, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Family-Friendly Bali Escape near Jimbaran Beach with Spa & Pirate-Themed Kids' Club
description:
Experience the tranquil beauty of Bali with a stay at this indulgent resort and spa, minutes from popular Jimbaran beach. Rooms that offer scenic views and quintessential island living vibes will ensure you get plenty of relaxation. Taste the flavours of Indonesia at Anarasa Restaurant and sip on cocktails at the Jejala Pool Bar while taking a break from swims in the sprawling pool.

The hotel also boasts a luxurious spa offering authentic Balinese massages and treatments for finding inner balance. This five-star retreat is a stone's throw from the region's best shopping, dining and nightlife, making it easy for those who want to explore, while beach lovers can stroll to Jimbaran Beach and spend hours lazing on its soft sands.
offer_address: Jalan Wanagiri No.1, Jimbaran, South Kuta, Bali 80362, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Pool Villa Retreat Near Jimbaran Beach
description:
Set moments from a pristine sweep of sand and hugged by a dense canopy of swaying coconut palms you’ll find the five-star Kayumanis Jimbaran Private Estate & Spa - a tropical haven ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Couples and families alike can seek solace in this tranquil oasis that was once a former coconut grove. Today, the stunning resort has been expertly designed with no detail overlooked.

While the surrounding area is nothing short of spectacular, with Jimbaran Beach a short walk away, the resort’s exceptional offerings make it difficult to tear yourself away. Within the Kayumanis Spa Jimbaran, you will find a curated offering of luxe treatments for body, mind, and spirit. Yogis can continue their practice with onsite yoga masters who will guide you through your practice or help relieve any jet lag. Meanwhile, gourmands will not be disappointed by the exceptional fusion of traditional Indonesian cuisine with market-fresh ingredients, catch-of-the-day seafood and seasonal delicacies at Kaymanis Resto Jimbaran.
offer_address: Jalan Yoga Perkanthi, Jimbaran, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Award-Winning Mövenpick Bali Indulgence with Four Restaurants & Chocolate Hour
description: Life doesn’t get much sweeter than a stay at Bali's foremost family resort, the five-star award-winning Mövenpick Resort & Spa Jimbaran Bali, offering true resort luxury and nonstop family fun just minutes from the shimmering beachfront of Jimbaran. Make new memories with the whole family splashing around in the huge interconnected swimming pool, complete with swim-up pool bar, a water slide and kids play area, or enjoy one-on-one time as the kids have the time of their lives at the pirate-ship-themed kids' club. Enjoy the privacy of high-end eateries like Anarasa Restaurant or Mövenpick Cafe, indulge in afternoon cocktails with sweeping views or rejuvenate with a relaxing treatment at the spa. When reunited, the dazzling array of activities available to book through Mövenpick - from watersport adventures to cultural tours - will provide endless excitement for the whole family.
offer_address: Jl. Wanagiri No.1, Jimbaran, Kec. Kuta Selatan Bali, 80362, Indonesia

title: Five-Star AYANA Bali Escape Overlooking Jimbaran Bay with 14 Swimming Pools
description:
RIMBA by AYANA Bali is designed for those seeking a balance of modern luxury and a lively atmosphere. Set within the lush tropical gardens of AYANA Bali, RIMBA features contemporary rooms with thoughtful design elements, including the use of driftwood and discarded timber. The resort’s rooms are thoughtfully designed to accommodate families, with options for adjoining rooms and child-friendly amenities that ensure comfort and convenience for guests of all ages. 

This luxurious resort perfectly pairs stunning sunset views with 30 onsite restaurants & bars, entertainment, a unique spa and an 18-hole golf course. Parents can unwind, knowing their little ones are entertained with engaging activities at the kids' club or enjoying the resort's pools, while the whole family can explore the lush surroundings.
offer_address: Jalan Karang Mas Sejahtera, Jimbaran, Bali 80364, Indonesia

title: Tranquil Beachfront Resort with 14 Swimming Pools Perched above Jimbaran Bay
description:
This flagship property of AYANA Bali is an expansive luxury retreat perched on the cliffs of Jimbaran Bay, offering breathtaking ocean vistas. Featuring elegant ocean-view or garden-view rooms and spacious suites, the resort showcases a harmonious blend of traditional Balinese aesthetics and modern comforts. 

Renowned for its world-class dining, including the global icon Rock Bar, guests can savour a variety of culinary experiences. With multiple pools, a secluded beach and a wide array of activities encompassing wellness, fitness and cultural experiences, AYANA Resort Bali perfectly combines relaxation and exploration, delivering a truly luxurious escape for every guest.
offer_address: Jalan Karang Mas Sejahtera Jimbaran, Bali 80364, Indonesia

vendor_name: The Jimbaran Villa by Ini Vie Hospitality
title: Secluded Bali Villa with Rooftop Terrace & Ocean Views
description: Succumb to the call of Bali’s pristine beaches, palm-fringed landscapes and turquoise waters with a stay at The Jimbaran Villa - a hidden oasis with rooftop ocean views. Perfect for a romantic getaway, this intimate escape offers boutique accommodation in the quieter region of Bali and is easily within walking distance of beachfront restaurants and bars. Relax in divine luxury by enjoying a private floating breakfast and catching the picturesque sunset from the furnished rooftop terrace.
offer_address: Jalan Bukit Permai, Mimpi Resort No. 88, Jimbaran 80361, Bali, Indonesia
